title: Uncovering Secret Updates In Flight Simulator 2020 Sim Update 15 Beta Build 3
description:
In this short we will have a look at some hidden updates in Sim Update 15 beta build 3 which are not described in the release notes. 
Since this is a short the cmdlet user to figure this out might be hard to read that is why the cmdlet is also listed below:

get-childitem |  where {([datetime]::now.Date -eq $_.LastWriteTime.Date)}
